title: By the Queene. Wereas the Queenes Maiestie our soueraigne lady by reason of the plague [and] pestilence in the citie of London, dyd lately by her proclamation adiourne part of the tearme of S. Michael ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation further postponing Michaelmas term because of the plague.
